layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x82
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x82
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x50
      LayoutBlockFlow {OL} at (0,0) size 784x50
        LayoutListItem {LI} at (40,0) size 744x50
          LayoutListMarker (anonymous) at (-16,16) size 16x18: "1"
          LayoutText {#text} at (16,16) size 596x18
            text run at (16,16) width 596: "A single outline should only appear over the list element, and not over internal text elements."
